siteInfo.name: Arkann Academy
siteInfo.description: A nurturing in-person microschool inside the Islamic Center of Boca Raton (ICBR), where faith, character, and strong academics grow together.

hero.headline: A Caring Specialized Academy Where Faith, Character, and Academics Grow Together

whoIsArkannFor.header: Arkann Academy Is For Families Who…
points: Value character and adab as much as academics
Want their child known as a person, not a number
Believe faith should be lived daily, not added on
Prefer depth over speed, mastery over pressure
whoIsArkannFor.disclaimer: Arkann is designed for families who seek education rooted in purpose and character.

differentiators.title: Small by Design
differentiators.description: Limited enrollment ensures every child is seen, supported, and guided daily.

differentiators.title: Personalized Learning
differentiators.description: Students progress at their own pace with teacher guidance—not comparison.

differentiators.title: Faith as Foundation
differentiators.description: Islamic values are woven into daily life, not confined to a single class period.

parentConcerns.header: We Understand What Parents Are Worried About
parentConcerns.body:
Many families come to Arkann feeling torn between academic excellence and preserving their child's faith, confidence, and emotional well-being.

Arkann was created so parents no longer have to choose.

ctaSection.body: We invite families who value intention, character, and meaningful learning to explore whether Arkann is the right fit for their child.

faqs.question: Is Arkann Academy a full-time school?
faqs.answer: Arkann Academy operates as a full-time, structured learning program during the academic year. Students attend daily and engage in a balanced schedule of academic learning, character development, and faith-centered experiences within a small, supportive environment.

faqs.question: How many students are in each class?
faqs.answer: Enrollment is intentionally limited. Small groups allow our educators to truly know each student—their strengths, challenges, and pace—so learning remains personal rather than standardized.

faqs.question: What curriculum does Arkann use?
faqs.answer: Arkann uses a personalized learning framework supported by high-quality academic resources and teacher guidance. Rather than a one-size-fits-all curriculum, instruction is adapted to meet students where they are and help them grow with confidence and depth.

faqs.question: How is faith integrated into the school day?
faqs.answer: Faith at Arkann is lived, not added on. Islamic values, adab, and reflection are woven naturally into daily routines, conversations, and relationships—alongside dedicated time for Qur'an, Arabic, and Islamic Studies.

faqs.question: Is Arkann right for high-achieving students?
faqs.answer: Yes. Arkann is well suited for students who thrive with depth, independence, and thoughtful guidance. High-achieving students benefit from the ability to move ahead without pressure or comparison, while still being challenged meaningfully.

faqs.question: Is Arkann suitable for children who need extra support?
faqs.answer: Arkann's small setting allows teachers to notice and respond quickly when a child needs additional support. While we are not a specialized therapeutic program, many families appreciate the individualized attention and calm structure we provide.

faqs.question: How does Arkann prepare students academically for the future?
faqs.answer: By focusing on strong foundational skills, critical thinking, and responsibility, Arkann prepares students not just for the next grade—but for lifelong learning. Students learn how to think, reflect, and engage with purpose.

faqs.question: Do student take standardized testing ?
faqs.answer: We follow state requirements for standardized testing which are done on campus at Arkann academy.

faqs.question: How does enrollment work?
faqs.answer: After the request enrollment conversation form is filled out team will contact you to start the conversation about enrollment.

faqs.question: What makes Arkann different from other Islamic schools?
faqs.answer: Arkann is intentionally small, deeply personal, and thoughtfully designed. We prioritize presence over pressure, character over competition, and depth over scale—while holding academics and faith to equally high standards.

about.mission: At Arkann Academy, our mission is to cultivate grounded, capable, and purposeful children through a calm, intentional learning environment that honors each child's individuality, nurtures strong character rooted in Islamic values, and delivers rigorous, personalized academics without haste, excess, or compromise.
about.vision: We envision children who grow with knowledge, character, and faith—prepared not only for academic success, but for a meaningful life.
about.story: Arkann Academy was founded out of a deep conviction that children thrive when education is calm, intentional, and rooted in values. After years of observing the gap between academic rigor and character development, Arkann was created to offer a small, purpose-driven environment where both are nurtured together.

academics.philosophy: Skill-based, personalized learning in small classes with a calm environment and easy transitions.
academics.approach: Students learn in small groups to allow for targeted instruction, meaningful discussion, and real-time feedback. Lessons are informed by each child's readiness and progress. Concepts are reinforced through hands-on activities.

assessment.philosophy: Mastery and growth over test performance
progressSupports: Parent progress summaries: short written updates.
Intervention checkpoints: early identification of gaps.
Behavioral and character development observations tied to values.
Written teacher feedback: narrative feedback beyond grades.

quran.approach: Recitation based on student level. Hifz encouraged for those already in a hifz program.

islamicStudies: 500 words that make 75% of the Quran ?
islamicProgram.faithIntegration: Faith at Arkann is lived, not added on. Islamic values, adab, and reflection are woven naturally into daily routines, conversations, and relationships.

schedule.lunch: Bring from home; small school store available

scholarships.description: Arkann Academy welcomes students using Florida state scholarships, including FTC, FES-EO, and FES-UA, in accordance with state program guidelines.

staff.name: Hanan Khalil
staff.title: Founder & Owner
staff.bio: Holds a degree in Islamic Studies and a Bachelor of General Studies with a minor in Business Management. Completed Qur'an Hifz program.

staff.name: Danna Elzagha
staff.title: Lead Instructor
staff.credentials: K-5 Certified, Upper School Math & Science Certified

staff.name: Layann Abdallah
staff.title: Instructor
staff.credentials: Education Major Graduate, Upper School Math Teaching Certified

invitationRequest.subject: invitation request
invitationRequest.body:
Assalamu Alaikum,

I am writing to request an invitation to learn more about Arkann Academy.

My child is ___ years old and currently in ___ grade. We are seeking a learning environment that supports strong academics while nurturing character, confidence, and Islamic values.

After learning about Arkann Academy, we feel its philosophy and approach may be a good fit for our family, and we would appreciate the opportunity to explore this further.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
[Parent Name]
[Child's Name]
[Phone Number]

seo.title: Arkann Academy | Islamic Microschool in Boca Raton, FL
seo.description: A nurturing microschool where faith, character, and strong academics grow together. Personalized learning grounded in Islamic values for grades 3-8 in Boca Raton.
